home1: We are a firm of tax, accounting, legal, and business advisors.
home2: Our firm was built on pillars that constitute our differentiators: solid experience, specialized knowledge, personalized service tailored to the needs of clients, dynamism, creativity, and international reach.
aboutUs1: We are a firm of tax, accounting, legal, and business advisors for high-net-worth families, investment funds, national and multinational companies, as well as their shareholders or owners.
aboutUs2: Our services are built on pillars that constitute our differentiators: excellence and professionalism, expert and specialized knowledge, solid experience, personalized service, creativity, and international reach.
aboutUs3: Composed of a multidisciplinary team, MXA provides comprehensive professional advice in the areas of tax, accounting, legal, notarial, and general business, both at the local and international levels.
